Observed at: Corner Brook 4:30 AM NDT Sunday 2 April 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 98.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -1.7°C
Wind: ENE 11 km/h

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 1 with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming east 30 gusting to 50 except 80 along parts of the coast overnight. Low minus 1 with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain or snow. High plus 4 with temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle changing to a few flurries near noon. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 4 with temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls overnight. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm except 10 cm over higher terrain. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 in the evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023
